mapper.select:
select BOARD_NUM, TITLE, ID, NICK, CONTENT, HIT_CNT, CATEGORY, MBTI, LIKE_CNT, CREATE_DT from TB_BOARD where ID = #{ID}
ORDER BY CREATE_DT
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NUM, TITLE, ID, NICK, CONTENT, HIT_CNT, CREATE_DT, CATEGORY, MBTI, LIKE_CNT) VALUES (SEQ_TB_BOARD_BOARD_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{ID}, #{NICK}, #{CONTENT}, 0, SYSDATE, #{CATEGORY}, #{MBTI}, 0);
mapper.delete: delete from TB_BOARD where ID = #{ID} AND BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BOARD_IMG (IMG_NUM, BOARD_NUM, ORIGINAL_NM, FILE_SIZE, SAVED_NM) values (SEQ_TB_BOARD_IMG_IMG_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{BOARD_NUM}, #{ORIGINAL_NM}, #{FILE_SIZE}, #{SAVED_NM});
mapper.select: select IMG_NUM, BOARD_NUM, ORIGINAL_NM, FILE_SIZE, SAVED_NM from TB_BOARD_IMG where BOARD_NUM = #{BOARD_NUM};
